name: Cats vs Burglars
description:
This game was made for #MiniJam17. The theme was "Home Alone" and the daily announced limitations were:

  1.  No mouse input (1st day)
  2. No combat (2nd day)
  3. Must have a star (3rd day)

This game is better played FULLSCREEN.

A family went to the park to watch a beautiful meteor shower leaving their pets home alone.

Unknown to the family, a pack of thieves saw an opportunity to rob their home clean.

It is up to the pets to stop the scumbags from stealing everything before the meteor shower is over and the family gets home. Help the pets by pushing the thieves and jumping over them. 

The cats will get tired after a few pushes or jumps and will rest for a few seconds before carrying on.

Watch the shooting star, when it goes down the horizon time is up!

RETURN or ENTER to start or restart game.  ESC to get here again.
ARROWS to move
SPACE BAR to jump.
Right CTRL to switch among pets.
